title: Hitachi Vantara takes servers offline after Akira ransomware attack
summary: Hitachi Vantara, a subsidiary of Japanese multinational conglomerate Hitachi, was forced to take servers offline over the weekend to contain an Akira ransomware attack. [...]

title: VeriSource now says February data breach impacts 4 million people
summary: Employee benefits administration firm VeriSource Services is warning that a data breach exposed the personal information of four million people.  [...]

title: Over 1,200 SAP NetWeaver servers vulnerable to actively exploited flaw
summary: Over 1,200 internet-exposed SAP NetWeaver instances are vulnerable to an actively exploited maximum severity unauthenticated file upload vulnerability that allows attackers to hijack servers. [...]

title: Kali Linux warns of update failures after losing repo signing key
summary: ​Offensive Security warned Kali Linux users to manually install a new Kali repository signing key to avoid experiencing update failures. [...]

title: Microsoft fixes Outlook on the web search issues, failures
summary: Microsoft is working on fully mitigating issues causing Outlook on the web and SharePoint Online users to experience delays or failures when searching. [...]

title: Cloudflare mitigates record number of DDoS attacks in 2025
summary: Internet services giant Cloudflare says it mitigated a record number of DDoS attacks in 2024, recording a massive 358% year-over-year jump and a 198% quarter-over-quarter increase. [...]
